item.name: CashFlowTransactions
item.query: //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- // Select recorders from general journal having Bank or Undeposited funds movemants but not both of them // SELECT ALLOWED GeneralJournal.Recorder AS Recorder, SUM(CASE WHEN GeneralJournal.Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BankPresent, SUM(CASE WHEN GeneralJournal.Account = UFAccount.Value THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UFPresent INTO Recorders FROM AccountingRegister.GeneralJournal AS GeneralJournal LEFT JOIN Constant.UndepositedFundsAccount AS UFAccount ON True WHERE GeneralJournal.AmountRC > 0 {WHERE GeneralJournal.Period BETWEEN &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod} GROUP BY GeneralJournal.Recorder HAVING // (BankPresent XOR UFPresent): (SUM(CASE WHEN GeneralJournal.Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 OR SUM(CASE WHEN GeneralJournal.Account = UFAccount.Value THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0) AND NOT (SUM(CASE WHEN GeneralJournal.Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN GeneralJournal.Account = UFAccount.Value THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0); //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- // Select corresponding records (Sum(Dt) = Sum(Ct)) of selected recorders from General Journal // SELECT ALLOWED GJ1.Period AS Period, GJ1.Recorder AS Recorder, GJ1.AmountRC AS AmountRC, GJ1.Account AS AccountDebit, GJ1.Account.CashFlowSection AS CashFlowSectionDebit, CASE WHEN GJ1.Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank) THEN True ELSE False END AS BankPresentDebit, CASE WHEN GJ1.Account = UFAccount.Value THEN True ELSE False END AS UFPresentDebit, GJ2.Account AS AccountCredit, GJ2.Account.CashFlowSection AS CashFlowSectionCredit, CASE WHEN GJ2.Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank) THEN True ELSE False END AS BankPresentCredit, CASE WHEN GJ2.Account = UFAccount.Value THEN True ELSE False END AS UFPresentCredit INTO CoorespondingRecords FROM AccountingRegister.GeneralJournal AS GJ1 LEFT JOIN AccountingRegister.GeneralJournal AS GJ2 ON (GJ1.Recorder = GJ2.Recorder AND GJ1.AmountRC = GJ2.AmountRC AND GJ1.LineNumber <> GJ2.LineNumber) LEFT JOIN Constant.UndepositedFundsAccount AS UFAccount ON True WHERE GJ1.Recorder IN (SELECT Recorder FROM Recorders) AND GJ1.RecordType = VALUE(AccountingRecordType.Debit) AND GJ2.RecordType = VALUE(AccountingRecordType.Credit); //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- // Select debit and credit corresponding accounts of bank und undeposited funds records // from corresponding records (Sum(Dt) = Sum(Ct)) of selected recorders from General Journal // SELECT DebitRecords.CashFlowSectionDebit AS CashFlowSection, DebitRecords.AccountDebit AS Account, DebitRecords.Period AS Period, DebitRecords.Recorder AS Recorder, -DebitRecords.AmountRC AS AmountRC INTO CashFlowAmounts FROM CoorespondingRecords AS DebitRecords WHERE NOT (DebitRecords.BankPresentDebit OR DebitRecords.UFPresentDebit) UNION ALL SELECT CreditRecords.CashFlowSectionCredit, CreditRecords.AccountCredit, CreditRecords.Period AS Period, CreditRecords.Recorder, CreditRecords.AmountRC FROM CoorespondingRecords AS CreditRecords WHERE NOT (CreditRecords.BankPresentCredit OR CreditRecords.UFPresentCredit); //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- // Combine corresponding accounts of bank und undeposited funds records with constants // and format the final dataset SELECT ALLOWED //Companies.Ref AS OurCompany, SystemTitle.Value AS OurCompany, CashFlowSections.Ref AS CashFlowSection, CashFlow.Account AS Account, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Year) AS YearPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Quarter) AS QuarterPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Month) AS MonthPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Week) AS WeekPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Day) AS DayPeriod, CashFlow.Recorder AS Recorder, CASE WHEN (NOT CashFlow.Recorder IS NULL) THEN CashFlow.AmountRC ELSE 0 END AS AmountRC, 0 AS AmountRCOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountRCClosingBalance {SELECT CashFlowSection.*, Account.*, Recorder, YearPeriod, QuarterPeriod, MonthPeriod, WeekPeriod, DayPeriod} FROM Enum.CashFlowSections AS CashFlowSections // Our company for a possible multicompany accounting in a future //LEFT JOIN Catalog.Companies AS Companies //ON (Companies.Ref = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.OurCompany)) LEFT JOIN CashFlowAmounts AS CashFlow ON CashFlowSections.Ref = CashFlow.CashFlowSection, Constant.SystemTitle AS SystemTitle {WHERE CashFlowSections.Ref AS CashFlowSection, CashFlow.Account AS Account, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Year) AS YearPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Quarter) AS QuarterPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Month) AS MonthPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Week) AS WeekPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashFlow.Period, Day) AS DayPeriod, CashFlow.Recorder AS Recorder}

item.name: CashFlowBalance
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED //Companies.Ref AS OurCompany, SystemTitle.Value AS OurCompany, NULL AS CashFlowSection, // No division by cash flow section and accounts NULL AS Account, // Balances will be shown only in totals GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod, NULL AS Recorder, // We will not use the drill down by the columns, no need to be detailed to the recorder GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountRCTurnover * 0 AS AmountRC, // This is workaround forcing the DCS get the data form the register for getting a drill-down to properly working GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountRCOpeningBalance AS AmountRCOpeningBalance, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountRCClosingBalance AS AmountRCClosingBalance {SELECT CashFlowSection.*, Account.*, Recorder, YearPeriod, QuarterPeriod, MonthPeriod, WeekPeriod, DayPeriod} FROM AccountingRegister.GeneralJournal.BalanceAndTurnovers({&BeginOfPeriod}, {&EndOfPeriod}, Auto, RegisterRecordsAndPeriodBoundaries, Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank), , ) AS GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers, Constant.SystemTitle AS SystemTitle // Our company for a possible multicompany accounting in a future //LEFT JOIN Catalog.Companies AS Companies //ON (Companies.Ref = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.OurCompany)) {WHERE NULL AS CashFlowSection, NULL AS Account, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod, NULL AS Recorder}

v8:item.v8:content: Net increase in cash and cash equivalents
Net increase in cash and cash equivalents
Net increase in cash and cash equivalents
